title: LiveType Project new name - help!
content:
As you might know, to avoid legal issues with Apple\*, the LiveType Project will change it's name into... what into it's still not decided. **[Please vote on this poll](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019194023/http:/livetype.sourceforge.net/poll)** and give us your oppinion about wich name to choose, or suggest a new name.

To people who still don't know this project, [here's a litle info](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019194023/http:/livetype.sourceforge.net/index.html).

\*As suggested by Adam [in this node](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019194023/http:/www.typophile.com/node/13565)

Some of the names thought were:

- Liveforge
- Livefoundry
- Typeforge
- Livefont
- Collabtype
- Co-type

We've been running slower these past days, but we'll make it up, you'll see!  
Thanks in advance for all the help and oppinions!

Cheers,  
Pedro

P.S.: We are also getting very excited as we prepare to attend ATypI Conference in Helsinki, next September. It would be cool to see some oppinions about ATypI here too!
